title: social media posts
extract: Clicks - the number of times your post was clicked on by a reader to "read more" or get to additional content. Facebook - A social networking website where users can add friends and send them messages, and update their personal profiles to notify friends about themselves.Feb 12, 2018
extract_html: Clicks - the number of times your post was clicked on by a reader to "read more" or get to additional content. Facebook - A social networking website where users can add friends and send them messages, and update their personal profiles to notify friends about themselves.Feb 12, 2018
